Index.title: Hi! I'm Camilo Matteo. I'm a Web Developer with +5 years of experience. Passionate about writing code and building sites & apps.

About.title: About me
About.paragraph_one: After graduating I enrolled myself in the world of programming and learned Web Development. My favorite part is the problem solving aspect. My main stack is React, Next.js and Node.js. I'm also familiar with TypeScript, Laravel and RoR. I am currently looking for a full-time position as a software developer.
About.paragraph_two: When I'm not coding, I enjoy playing video games like Wow and playing with my dogs. I also enjoy learning new things. I am currently reading about Uncle Bob's book Code-Clean.

last_job.title: Software Developer
last_job.description: Jumpitt Labs S.A. - MicroFrontend with ReactJS, Typescript, Redux, Antd. Others Web development using MaterialUI and Tailwind. API Gateway with NestJS, RubyOnRails and a litte bit of ReactNative in a mobile project.
